## Journal publications

```{r refs, results='asis'}

refs <- bibtex::read.bib("references.bib")


years <- as.integer(unique(refs$year)) |> 
  sort(decreasing = TRUE)

for(y in years) {
  print(glue::glue("### {y} {{#published-{y}}}"))
  print(refs[refs$year == y], style = "html")
  cat("<hr />")
}
```
